anomalies.title: Massive Selective File Deletion
anomalies.finding: Exactly 5 minutes after the reported incident time on Dec 14, 4.2 GB of video files (137 files) were bulk-deleted from the device. The deletion was highly targeted ‚Äî only .mp4 and .mov video files were removed while all photos, documents, and audio files were left untouched.
anomalies.whySuspicious: The timing (5 minutes post-incident) and selectivity (only videos) strongly indicate deliberate evidence destruction. A normal cleanup would not target only video files. Videos likely contained visual evidence of the crime ‚Äî meetings, transactions, or locations that could identify accomplices.
nextSteps: Attempt forensic recovery of deleted .mp4 and .mov files using specialized tools
Analyze file metadata of recovered videos ‚Äî check creation dates, GPS tags, and camera info
Check if any of the 137 deleted files were shared via WhatsApp/Signal before deletion
Examine cloud backup services (Google Photos, iCloud) for synced copies of deleted videos
Document the exact 5-minute gap as evidence of consciousness of guilt
